title: Ticket #6977: Allow use of private Docker repos
description:
CERN users are starting to want to run their analysis from a private image repository. This repository contains their personal code corresponding to analyses that haven't been published -- not a great candidate for DockerHub.

They do, however, have access to a token that allows them to access the private repository. They'd like to be able to give this token to HTCondor and have it used when the Docker image is downloaded.
